segments.text: Hi , I made a reservation for a mid-size vehicle . The name is Jimmy Fox .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , we have no mid-size available at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t understand , I made a reservation , do you have my reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do , unfortunately we ran out of cars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the reservation keeps the car here . That ’ s why you have the reservation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know why we have reservations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think you do.If you did , I ’ d have a car.See , you know how to take the reservation , you just don ’ t know how to hold the reservation and that ’ s really the most important part of the reservation , the holding . Anybody can just take them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But we do have a compact or an SUV if you ’ d like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . I ’ ll take the compact .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . We have a blue Ford Focus for you , Mr . Fox . Would you like insurance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you better give me the insurance , because I am gonna beat the hell out of this car .
segments.speaker: S1
